text:
Using --with-module as described in the docs,
--with-module=<module_type>:<module_name> with full path name to module results
in the module and subsequent modules that rely on the variable module including
libname to be create incorrectly when running configure
--with-module=module_type:module_name
creator: gez.saunders@virgin.net
gez.saunders@virgin.net
text:
configure has the line :

module=`echo $pkg | sed -e 's;\(.*/\)*mod_\(.*\).c;\2;'`

I think this should be :

module=`echo $pkg | sed -e 's;\(.*/\).*mod_\(.*\).c;\2;'`

to get the required result.
